verses.arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the mount
verses.transliteration: Wat-Toor

verses.arabic: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: And [by] a Book inscribed
verses.transliteration: Wa kitaabim mastoor

verses.arabic: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: In parchment spread open
verses.transliteration: Fee raqqim manshoor

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the frequented House
verses.transliteration: Wal baitil ma'moor

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: And [by] the heaven raised high
verses.transliteration: Wassaqfil marfoo'

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],
verses.transliteration: Wal bahril masjoor

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.
verses.transliteration: Inna 'azaaba Rabbika lawaaqi'

verses.arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.arabicSimple: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: Of it there is no preventer.
verses.transliteration: Maa lahoo min daafi'

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion
verses.transliteration: Yawma tamoorus samaaa'u mawraa

verses.arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing -
verses.transliteration: Wa taseerul jibaalu sairaa

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,
verses.transliteration: Fawailuny yawma 'izil lil mukaazzibeen

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.
verses.transliteration: Allazeena hum fee khawdiny yal'aboon

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],
verses.transliteration: Yawma yuda'-'oona ilaa naari jahannama da'-'aa

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.
verses.transliteration: Haazihin naarul latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon

verses.arabic: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see?
verses.transliteration: Afasihrun haazaaaa am antum laa tubsiroon

verses.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."
verses.transliteration: Islawhaa fasbirooo aw laa tasbiroo sawaaa'un 'alaikum innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

segments.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ
segments.translation: Burn in it then be patient or do not be patient it is same for you
segments.transliteration: iṣ'lawhā fa-iṣ'birū aw lā taṣbirū sawāon ʿalaykum

segments.translation: Only you are being recompensed for what you used to do

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,
verses.transliteration: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa na'eem

verses.arabic: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.
verses.transliteration: Faakiheena bimaaa aataahum rabbuhum wa waqaahum rabbuhum 'azaabal jaheem

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
verses.transliteration: Kuloo washraboo haneee 'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
verses.transliteration: Muttaki'eena 'alaa sururim masfoofatinw wa zawwaj naahum bihoorin 'een

segments.translation: Reclining on thrones lined up
and We will marry them to fair ones with large eyes

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.
verses.transliteration: Wallazeena aamanoo wattaba'at hum zurriyyatuhum bieemaanin alhaqnaa bihim zurriyyatahum wa maaa alatnaahum min 'amalihim min shai'; kullum ri'im bimaa kasaba raheen

segments.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ
segments.translation: And those who believed and followed them their offspring in faith We will join with them their offspring and not We will deprive them of their deeds in any thing
segments.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū wa-ittabaʿathum dhurriyyatuhum biīmānin alḥaqnā bihim dhurriyyatahum wamā alatnāhum min ʿamalihim min shayin

segments.translation: Every person for what he earned is pledged

verses.arabic: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.
verses.transliteration: Wa amdadnaahum bifaa kihatinw wa lahmim mimmaa yashtahoon

verses.arabic: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.
verses.transliteration: Yatanaaza'oona feehaa kaasal laa laghwun feehaa wa laa taaseem

words.translation: They will pass to one another

verses.arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
verses.transliteration: Wa yatoofu 'alaihim ghilmaanul lahum ka annahum lu'lu'um maknoon

verses.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
verses.transliteration: Wa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatasaaa'aloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].
verses.transliteration: Qaalooo innaa kunnaa qablu feee ahlinaa mushfiqeen

verses.arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.translation: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.
verses.transliteration: Famannnal laahu 'alainaa wa waqaanaa 'azaabas samoom

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."
verses.transliteration: Innaa kunnaa min qablu nad'oohu innahoo huwal barrur raheem

segments.translation: Indeed, we [we] used to before before call Him
Indeed, He [He] is the Most Kind the Most Merciful

verses.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.arabicSimple: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.
verses.transliteration: Fazakkir famaaa anta bini'mati rabbika bikaahininw wa laa majnoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona shaa'irun natarabbasu bihee raibal manoon

verses.arabic: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
verses.transliteration: Qul tarabbasoo fa innee ma'akum minal mutarabbiseen

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?
verses.transliteration: Am taamuruhum ahlaamuhum bihaazaaa am hum qawmun taaghoon

segments.translation: Or command them their minds this
or they are a people transgressing

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona taqawwalah; bal laa yu'minoon

segments.translation: Or do they say He has made it up
Nay not they believe

verses.arabic: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.
verses.transliteration: Falyaatoo bihadeesim misliheee in kaanoo saadiqeen

verses.arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?
verses.transliteration: Am khuliqoo min ghairi shai'in am humul khaaliqoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.
verses.transliteration: Am khalaqus samaawaati wal ard; bal laa yooqinoon

segments.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth
Nay not they are certain

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?
verses.transliteration: Am'indahum khazaaa'inu rabbika am humul musaitiroon

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.
verses.transliteration: Am lahum sullamuny yastami'oona feehi falyaati mustami'uhum bisultaanim mubeen

segments.translation: Or for them is a stairway they listen therewith
Then let bring their listener an authority clear

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
verses.transliteration: Am lahul banaatu wa lakumul banoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
verses.transliteration: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
verses.transliteration: Am 'indahumul ghaibu fahum yaktuboon

verses.arabic: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.
verses.transliteration: Am yureedoona kaidan fallazeena kafaroo humul makeedoon

segments.translation: Or do they intend a plot
But those who disbelieve themselves are in the plot

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
verses.transliteration: Am lahum ilaahun ghairul laa; subhaanal laahi 'ammaa yushrikoon

segments.translation: Or for them a god other than Allah
Glory be to Allah from what they associate with Him

verses.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
verses.transliteration: Wa iny yaraw kisfam minas samaaa'i saaqitany yaqooloo sahaabum markoom

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
verses.transliteration: Fazarhum hatta yulaaqoo yawmahumul lazee feehi yus'aqoon

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.
verses.transliteration: Yawma laa yughnee 'anhum kaidumhum shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
verses.transliteration: Wa inna lillazeena zalamoo 'azaaban doona zalika wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.
verses.transliteration: Wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa innaka bi-a'yuninaa wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoom

segments.translation: So be patient for the Command of your Lord for indeed, you are in Our Eyes
And glorify the praise of your Lord when you arise

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
verses.transliteration: Wa minal laili fasabbihhu wa idbaaran nujoom
